ABOUTUSTEXT: LostFound is a web-based system that will allow users to report lost or found items on a Campus. The system provides a simple and user friendly interaction with the user. Every user that wants to use any of the versions of this web-app will have to register with an email and a phone number. Each user will have a credibility status. This status will be made by the grant of other users on the app which indicates that it is a trustworthy user. Also to avoid bad intentional users, the application provides a way to report an user. This report can be seen by every user registered on the application to keep them warned.
